meanings.definition: Relating to or affected by atresia.
meanings.sent1: The atresic condition of the blocked tube was causing discomfort.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that the atresic artery was preventing proper blood flow.
meanings.sent3: The atresic valve in the plumbing system was causing all the water to back up!
meanings.sent4: Her atresic mindset was like a closed door, shutting out any new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The atresic wall stood tall, blocking any passage through.

meanings.sent1: The atresic condition of the pipe was evident from the blockage.
meanings.sent2: The atresic tumor was causing complications for the patient.
meanings.sent3: The atresic lock was so stubborn, it wouldn't budge!
meanings.sent4: His atresic personality made it hard for him to connect with others.
meanings.sent5: The atresic barrier seemed impenetrable, like a fortress.

meanings.sent1: The medication had an atresic effect on the patient's condition.
meanings.sent2: The atresic treatment unfortunately led to further complications.
meanings.sent3: The atresic spell cast by the wizard sealed the entrance shut!
meanings.sent4: The atresic decision to close the bridge caused chaos in the town.
meanings.sent5: The atresic blockage in the drain was like a dam holding back water.
